title: How to win at anything - Quora

response.answer_text: ideally I wont suggest that you win at everything as it will get very boring and you will loose the interest in winning . its like you cant what you have and if you have everything you want its very mundane and mediocre. To know more about this topic come over to Discover Your Self, Free Session and we will get back to you

If you want to win at everything then make sure your opponent or other competitors loses. For that you need to expertise that particular subject. You have to be the best to win at everything and for that you need to work hard. Being jack of all trades is good in this competitive world but you need to master at least one subject.
